headerName.title: Authorization Header
headerName.description: Name of the HTTP Header containing the authorization

headerValue.title: Authorization Header Value
headerValue.description: Value to use for the Authorization Header (ex: 'Basic Y2xpZW50aWQ6Y2xpZW50c2VjcmV0Cg==' or 'Bearer eyJraWQiOiJkZWZhdWx0I')

connectTimeout.title: HTTP Client connect timeout
connectTimeout.description: Duration of time in milliseconds that connects will block. (default 5000 ms)

idleTimeout.title: HTTP Client idle timeout
idleTimeout.description: Duration of time in milliseconds that request will hold. (default 10000 ms)

maxPoolSize.title: HTTP Client max pool size
maxPoolSize.description: Maximum pool of connections can grow to. (default 10)
